name: Microzine 38
overview: Microzine 38 includes another four programs. "Eskimo Escapade" is a puzzle game that has the player searching pictures for anomalies and identifying them. "Math Mall" is a math game involving fractions and decimals. "Out Space Adventures in Government" is an educational adventure game that has the player travelling the solar system when the player's ship crashes. Finally. "Exploring Simple Machines" has the player creating simple machines to solve simple tasks
